channel.title: babies on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in babies on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Fourth month
item.description: (17th April - 16th May) Normally A is taken to doctor for monthly check-up once other then that no outing for him. As he is considered too small for all these by my parents. So they neither allow him nor me to go anywhere. After birth it was third time when Aarush was taken out of the house to meet people other then his doc’s clinic. Moreover because of weather it was difficult for us to go anywhere.
